name: razinka
description:
Razinka is a puzzle game,  composed of playing area contain incomplete lines of

blocks , and pieces falling from top, you can move it right or left or rotate it until

it touching a line, if line is complete is cleared, otherwise  is accumulated.

if  you clear the bottom line you win.

You must be quick to act and patient, do not think that you will win, if you do you will lose

Please share it with your friend,  with your support, you will help us to make more.

thank you.

Help :

Keyboard control :

 Left :  Move piece left 

Right :  Move piece right

 Down :  Speed falling down 

Suppr : Rotate piece
